ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.title: &aArtifacts[--&a工匠--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.subtitle: Treasures from The Zone[--来自“区域”的宝藏--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests0.desc: Can be used to slowfall and as a shield in a pinch[--可用于缓降,并用作锤子中的盾牌--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests1.desc: Does not get consumed when eaten, meaning it's an infinite food source.[--食用后不会被食用,意思是它是一个无限的食物源。--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests3.desc: Allows you to drink items faster[--允许你更快地饮用物品--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests4.desc: Allows you to drink items faster, but now with style![--允许你更快地饮用物品,但现在有风格!--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests5.desc: Provides infinite air underwater, very useful for those pesky underwater caves[--在水下提供无限空气,对于那些泥浆水下洞穴非常有用--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests6.desc: Provides an infinite night vision effect[--提供无限夜视效果--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests7.desc: Allows you to trade with villagers for much cheaper[--&2允许你与村民交易来更便宜--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests8.desc: Adds a looting effect to killed mobs[--为杀死生物添加抢夺效果--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests9.desc: Applies fortune to mined blocks[--将资源应用于挖掘方块--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests10.des: Applies an infinite invisibility potion, making you less noticeable to mobs[--给怪物一个无限的隐身药水,让你对怪物不那么值得注意--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests11.des: Increases the user's invulnerability frames after taking a hit[--在被击中后增加使用者的无敌框架--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests12.des: Gives a movement speed boost when taking damage[--造成伤害时提供移动速度提升--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests13.des: Strikes your attackers with lightning (occasionally)[--用闪电攻击你的攻击者(偶尔)--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests14.des: Lights your attackers on fire[--点燃攻击者--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests15.des: Damages attackers similar to the Thorns enchantment[--伤害攻击者类似于荆棘附魔--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests16.des: Allows the wearer to move unimpeded in water[--允许佩戴者在水中无阻移动--]
Note: You will sink to the bottom and can take fall damage[--注意:你将沉入底部,并可能受到摔落伤害--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests17.des: Allows you to double jump, similar to the Terraria item[--允许你双倍跳跃,类似于泰拉利亚物品--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests18.des: Grants temporary fire resistance when touching lava/fire[--接触熔岩/火焰时获得临时抗火效果--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests19.des: Reduces the time of debuffs[--减少解冻时间--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests20.des: Attracts dropped items to the wearer[--吸引掉落物到佩戴者身上--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests21.des: Grants around 10 extra health (5 hearts)[--获得大约10种额外的生命(5颗心)--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests22.des: Press CTRL while airborne to perform a short and slow glide[--在空中按CTRL键进行短暂和缓慢的滑翔--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests23.des: Increases the wearers mining speed and allows the wearer to break blocks like stone with their fist[--提高穿戴者挖掘速度,允许穿戴者使用拳头像石头一样破坏方块--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests24.des: Increases the wearer's attack speed[--增加穿戴者的攻击速度--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests25.des: Increases the damage dealt by the wearer[--增加穿戴者造成的伤害--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests26.des: Causes the wearer's attacks to set the target on fire[--使穿戴者的攻击点燃目标--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests27.des: Increases knockback from attacks[--增加击退--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests28.des: The wearer slightly heals from attacks[--穿戴者通过攻击获得轻微治疗--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests29.des: Increases experience dropped by mobs[--增加生物掉落的经验--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests30.des: The wearer can sprint on water[--穿戴者可以在水上疾跑--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests31.des: Increases wearer's jump height and negates all fall damage[--增加穿戴者跳跃高度并消除所有摔落伤害--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests32.des: Creepers will actively avoid the wearer[--苦力怕会主动避免佩戴--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests33.des: Drastically increases the wearer's sprint speed and allows for auto-step[--Drastically allowed's screw speapy and allowed to United Step--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests34.des: The wearer cannot be knocked back[--穿戴者无法被击退--]
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests35.des: Increases the wearer's swim speed[--提高穿戴者游泳速度--]
